title: (x) Commercial Appliance Centre logo - MS Trebuchet {Dav}
content:
This font looks much like ITC Officina Sans but slightly varied. I know it was done on an early system of Macintosh, so it is  
a family and hasn’t been altered in any way. I need to match this exactly does anyone know this font?

Thanks in advance.
